name: MAD MATCH!
description:
Just Tap & Swipe to complete this colorful journey through the walls.
Rotate the shapes and move them to the right lane to fit in the wall.
And careful, speed gradually increases.
Don’t get hit by the wall!

How to play:
• Tap to rotate the shapes
• Swipe to move the shapes to the right lane
• Swipe up and fill the charge bar for a reward

So, how far can you get?
